attributes.action: To instate an ‘Emergency Coalition Government of National Unity in Crisis’.
attributes.additional_details: We need an ‘Emergency Coalition Government of National Unity in Crisis’ to guide us through the rest of this pandemic to prevent further failings and further loss of life and livelihoods. We need a government which is more open in decision makings and how it operates. We need a government whom represents everyone in these times: people of all political affiliation, people of all backgrounds, people of all ages. We need a government which will confidently guide us through this pandemic.
attributes.background: We want the executive (government) to partially surrender it’s position of power to others in the legislature. We are calling for a coalition government, made up of the leaders from all major UK parties, to guide us through the remainder of this pandemic whilst representing everyone in the UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551504
